courses.name: Introduction To Programming With C++
projects: Build a UNIX Command Line Utility (e.g. count the characters/digits/punctuation/words/sentences/paragraphs in a txt document)
textbooks: Programming Principles and Practice Using C++
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of programming in the C++ programming language, including iteration, decision branching, data types and expression.

courses.name: Introduction To Computer Science
projects: Informational project on version control systems
textbooks: Computer Science Distilled: Learn the Art of Solving Computational Problems
supplemental_material: Chapters 1-4, 8-9, 11, 13-17 from Computer Science: The Hardware, Software And Heart Of IT
courses.description: An introduction to the intellectual enterprises of computer science and the art of programming.

courses.name: Introduction To Computer Hardware
projects: Informational project on motherboards
textbooks: Write Great Code I: Understanding The Machine
supplemental_material: Write Great Code II: Thinking Low-Level, Writing High-Level
courses.description: In this course we are going to learn about computer hardware components at a high level and learn about their use and purpose

courses.name: Programming With C++ #2
projects: Build a simple GUI To Do List storing and retrieving information using the file system
courses.description: This course is a continuation of "Introduction To Programming With C++", in which will delve deeper into the C++ language and learn its quirks through the use of advanced programming techniques

courses.name: Computer Organization & Assembly Language
projects: Build a Calculator using RISC Assembly language
textbooks: Computer Organization and Design: The Hardware-Software Interface
courses.description: Computer Organization and Assembly Language Programming deals with lower level computer programming—machine or assembly language, and how these are used in the typical computer system.

courses.name: Data Structures With C++
projects: Implement different Data Structures
textbooks: Data Structures And Algorithms In C++
Data Structures And Algorithms Made Easy
courses.description: In this class we are going to learn about the different ways we can logically arrange our data to make our programs more efficient

courses.name: Automata & Computational Theory
projects: Build a grammar for a JSON parser/serializer and implement it with C++
textbooks: Introduction to the Theory of Computation
courses.description: Automata theory is the study of abstract machines (or more appropriately, abstract 'mathematical' machines or systems) and the computational problems that can be solved using these machines.

courses.name: Algorithms & Advanced Data Structures With C++
projects: Build a UNIX file system
courses.description: Algorithms and Advanced Data Structures introduces a collection of algorithms for complex programming challenges in data analysis, machine learning, and graph computing using C++.

courses.name: Operating Systems & Systems Programming With C
projects: Build a Stopwatch Application with C and POSIX threads
courses.description: In this course we are going to learn what operating systems are, what they do, how they are designed and constructed, and program them using the C language.

courses.name: Reverse Engineering: Advanced Assembly Language
projects: Reverse engineer the assembly code of a compiled password protected program to gain unauthorized access
textbooks: Reverse Engineering for Beginners: Understanding Assembly Language
courses.description: In this course we are going to learn reverse engineering a program, which is a process or method through the application of which one attempts to understand through deductive reasoning how a device, process, system, or piece of software accomplishes a task with very little (if any) insight into exactly how it does so.

courses.name: Software Design, Principles & Paradigms With C++
projects: Build 3 different Pomodoro Timer Applications with GUI using Object-Oriented, Functional and Procedural Programming and Design Patterns
courses.description: In this course we are going to learn about different programming paradigms, their processes and their uses.

courses.name: Databases
projects: Build a Student and Personnel Database application for a University
courses.description: This course provides an introduction to relational databases and comprehensive coverage of SQL, the long-accepted standard query language for relational database systems.

courses.name: Computer Architecture
textbooks: Computer Organization and Architecture: Designing for Performance
courses.description: In this course, you will learn to design the computer architecture of complex modern microprocessors.

courses.name: Computer Networks
projects: Build your own TCP/IP Stack with C++ based on Berkley Sockets
supplemental_material: The Illustrated Network How TCP-IP Works in a Modern Network
Beej's Guide To Network Programming Using Internet Sockets
courses.description: This course is designed to provide a full overview of computer networking. We’ll cover everything from the fundamentals of modern networking technologies and protocols to an overview of the cloud to practical applications and network troubleshooting.

courses.name: Introduction To Web Development
projects: Design and develop an Autobiography/CV/Portfolio website for yourself
courses.description: This course is designed to help you learn the structure and functionality of the world wide web, create dynamic web pages using a combination of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and apply essential programming language concepts when creating HTML forms.

courses.name: Software Development Lifecycle
projects: Mock an SDLC by going through each phase while designing a Chatting application
textbooks: Modern C++ Design: Generic Programming and Design Patterns Applied
supplemental_material: Write Great Code III: Engineering Software
Structure And Interpretation Of Computer Programs
courses.description: In this course you will learn how to apply design principles, patterns, and architectures to create reusable and flexible software applications and systems.

courses.name: Distributed Systems & Android Development with native C++
projects: Develop an Android Workout Logger
textbooks: Google Android Kotlin Bootcamp Path and the NDK
courses.description: In this course you will learn about how distributed systems are designed and organised, and the implementation challenges developers face while implementing them. You will also learn to create android applications.

courses.name: Electronics & Digital Circuits
projects: (Optional) Try to develop a Remote Controlled Car Toy! (Arduino/Raspberry PI)
textbooks: Hacking Electronics Learning Electronics with Arduino and Raspberry Pi
supplemental_material: Top-Down Digital VLSI Design: From Architectures to Gate-Level Circuits and FPGAs

courses.name: Backend Development with JavaScript
projects: Develop the Chatting application you designed in the SDLC course

courses.name: Algorithms #2 & Algorithmic Design
projects: Build an Algorithm Visualizer with either C++/Electron.js on desktop or with JavaScript on the web
textbooks: Advanced Data Structures: Theory and Applications
supplemental_material: The Art of Computer Programming Volumes by Knuth
Sequential & Parallel Algorithms And Data Structures: The Basic Toolbox

courses.name: Communication Networks
projects: Informational project on 5G/6G

courses.name: Artificial Intelligence With C++
projects: Build a simple Weather Prediction Agent

courses.name: Systems Security
projects: Build a simple Virus
supplemental_material: Security Engineering: A Guide To Building Dependable Distributed Systems
The Art Of Software Security Assessment
Password Authentication For Web And Mobile Apps

courses.name: Advanced Databases & Database Design
projects: Design and develop an Advanced Database System for a Social Networking app utilizing at least 2 different DBMSs (e.g. graph, relational)
textbooks: Database Internals: A Deep-Dive into How Distributed Data Systems Work
supplemental_material: Database Systems: A Practical Approach to Design, Implementation & Management

courses.name: Parallel Programming
projects: ??? (Something with CUDA/C/C++ and GPU/MPI programming)
supplemental_material: Introduction to Parallel Computing From Algorithms to Programming on State-of-the-Art Platforms
Parallel Programming For Modern High Performance Computing Systems
Programming Massively Parallel Processors A Hands-On Approach
Structured Parallel Programming Patterns for Efficient Computation
Pro TBB C++ Parallel Programming with Threading Building Blocks
Parallel Programming For Multicore & Cluster Systems

courses.name: Computer Graphics & Game Development
projects: Build an Arcade Shooting Game
supplemental_material: Essential Mathematics for Games and Interactive Applications
Game Programming Algorithms and Techniques: A Platform-Agnostic Approach
Physics for Game Developers: Science, Math & Code for Realistic Effects

courses.name: Agile & DevOps
projects: Build a Calendar application using Agile Methodology, Version Control, CI/CD and ship with Docker
textbooks: Agile Software Development Principles, Patterns & Practices
Continuous Delivery: Reliable Software Releases Through Build, Test, and Deployment Automation
supplemental_material: Modern C++ Programming with Test-Driven Development: Code Better, Sleep Better
xUnit Test Patterns: Refactoring Test Code
Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code
Understanding the Four Rules of Simple Design
BDD in Action: Behavior-Driven Development for the Whole Software Lifecycle

courses.name: Machine Learning
projects: Build a Face Recognition application

courses.name: Network Security, Cybersecurity & Cryptography
projects: Harden your Chatting app or build a Firewall

courses.name: Blockchain, Data Mining & Python
projects: Build a Web Crawler
textbooks: Learn Python 3 the Hard Way: Rough Cuts
supplemental_material: Mastering Bitcoin: Programming the Open Blockchain
Learn More Python the Hard Way: The Next Step for New Python Programmers
Data Visualization Guide: Clear Introduction to Data Mining, Analysis & Visualization

courses.name: Embedded Systems Programming
projects: Build a Temperature Sensor on real hardware!
textbooks: Making Embedded Systems: Design Patterns for Great Software

courses.name: Compilers
projects: Build a mini C Compiler or C Interpreter

courses.name: Distributed Systems #2
textbooks: Designing Distributed Systems: Patterns And Paradigms For Scalable, Reliable Services
supplemental_material: Distributed Computing Principles, Algorithms, and Systems

courses.name: Case Study: Design & Develop A Programming Language
Financial Logistics
courses.description: Financial Logistics, is the science that deals with the systematic gathering, computing and provision of financial information, which is essential for decision making

courses.name: Microfinancial Theory
courses.description: The microfinancial emphasises in the decisions of atomic blocks and the consiquencies of those decisions

courses.name: Macrofinancial Theory
textbooks: Macrofinancial Principles and Politics, William Baumol & Alan Blinder
courses.descriprion: Examines the behaviors of wholeeconomies. That is, how the actions of the economic units,affect the whole economy and how they shape themEconomic measures

courses.name: Basic Principles of Civil Law
courses.textbooks: Basic Principles of Civil Law, Pinelopi Agallopoulou
courses.descriprion: Civil law is the set of heteronomous rules that regulate in a mandatory way the social coexistence of people
